text:
Axiomtek Accelerates Digital Signage Business with The Intel® OPS Module  OPS883
Axiomtek launches the OPS883, its newest Open Pluggable Specification digital signage player.
City of Industry, CA, August 31, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Axiomtek, one of the world's leading designers and manufacturers of innovative, high performance and reliable PC-based industrial computer products, is proud to announce the launch of the OPS883, its latest OPS digital signage player.
This digital signage player comes equipped with the high-performance 22 nm 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i7/i5/i3 or Celeron™ processor (codename: Haswell Refresh) and the Intel® Q87 Express chipset. The Intel® Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) standard helps digital signage player manufacturers to provide their customers with cost-saving benefits by simplifying installation, maintenance, and deployment processes. Axiomtek’s OPS883 offers rich features including 4K High Definition content, dual display, and real-time audio and video. The highly efficient OPS883 is excellent for multimedia applications in shopping malls, corporate offices, classrooms, banks, onboard trains or in transportation centers, retail stores, restaurants, or performing art centers.
The versatile OPS883 is equipped with one 2.5” HDD tray and one optional mSATA interface for increased storage, one PCI Express Mini Card slot for a graphics-enhanced video card, and wireless LAN card and 3G/LTE modules for wireless communication. Axiomtek’s high performance OPS883 also comes with Intel® Active Management Technology 9.0 (AMT 9.0), which helps simplify the integration process while offering convenient remote diagnosis and reducing maintenance cost.
“Nowadays, schools bring the internet, interactive e-Boards, and collaborative learning tools into their classrooms and buildings for increased interaction and enhanced learning,” said Vincent Ji, product manager for Axiomtek’s Product and Marketing Division. “More and more e-Boards are replacing projectors, traditional white boards and black boards in schools and meeting rooms. Policy makers are motivated to allocate more funding to encourage institutions and faculty to adopt this new technological trend, which will be widespread and essential in the future. Axiomtek’s OPS module with abundant useful features will be the best choice for companies that are embarking upon this growing market trend.”
This smart open pluggable module can connect to OPS-compliant displays via a standardized JAE TX-25 plug connector, which supports HDMI, DisplayPort, UART, audio, USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 signals. The front panel HDMI allows 4K resolution to meet high-definition display content.
Axiomtek’s OPS883 digital signage system player will be available in September. Axiomtek provides a wide array of IoT & M2M industrial systems for transportation, energy-saving & utility and automation fields. For more product information or pricing, please visit our global website at www.us.axiomtek.com or via Facebook, Twitter and YouTube. Please contact one of our sales representatives at solutions@axiomtek.com.
Advanced Features:
- Intel® Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) compliance
- 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i7/i5/i3 and Celeron® processors (Haswell Refresh)
- Supports DDR3 SO-DIMM 1600 max. up to 8 GB
- Supports one PCI Express Mini Card for WLAN or WWAN module
- Supports TPM 1.2
- HDMI for 2nd display with 4K resolution
- Intel® AMT 9.0 supported
About Axiomtek Co., Ltd
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. is one of the world's leading designers/manufacturers of PC-based industrial computer products. From its roots as a turnkey systems integrator specializing in data acquisition and control systems, Axiomtek has mirrored the PC evolution in various industries by shifting its focus toward the design and manufacture of PC-based industrial automation solutions.
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. established in 1990, has more than 60 distributor partners globally. Axiomtek offers Industrial PCs (IPC), Single Board Computers and System on Modules (slot CPU card, small form factor embedded boards & SoM), Fanless & Rugged Embedded System (eBOX, tBOX and rBOX), Industrial Firewall & Industrial Gateway, Touch Panel Computers (TPC), Medical PCs (MPC), Human Machine Interface (HMI), Digital Signage Players (DS), Industrial Network and Network Appliances (NA).
As an associate member of the Intel® Internet of Things Solutions Alliance, Axiomtek continuously develops and delivers cutting edge solutions based on the latest Intel® platforms.
